unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather messing with yields again! My grandfather in Punjab remembers 1965, similar issue. Think we need better irrigation, like they're trying near the Kaveri. Heard IIT Madras is working on drought-resistant seeds. Hoping for a good monsoon in 2024, especially after last year's patchy rains. My uncle lost Rs. 50000 because of it! Planting on 14/04/2024 at 11:00 hrs, fingers crossed! Saw some good signs on 26/01/2024! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather messing with yields again! My grandfather in Punjab remembers nineteen sixty five, similar issue. Think we need better irrigation, like they are trying near the Kaveri. Heard I I T Madras is working on drought-resistant seeds. Hoping for a good monsoon in two thousand and twenty four, especially after last year's patchy rains. My uncle lost rupee fifty thousand because of it! Planting on fourteenth april two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero hours, fingers crossed! Saw some good signs on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four! Jai Kisan!
